statements: DELETE FROM sentiment_analysis WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' AND sentiment_score < 0.5;
DELETE FROM stock_sentiments WHERE id = 1 AND sentiment_score > 0.5;
DELETE FROM StockSentiment WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND stock_name = 'Apple';
DELETE FROM trade_decisions WHERE decision_reason LIKE '%earnings%';
DELETE FROM stock_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score < 0.5 AND publication_date < '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM article_tags WHERE article_id = 'a1234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef' AND tag = 'technology'
